tuv.seg: Giving notice when changing your job
Ag tabhairt fógra le hathrú jabanna
Employees are required by law to give a certain period of notice when changing jobs
Má tá fostaithe ag athrú poist, caithfidh siad de réir an dlí tréimhse áirithe fógra a thabhairt
Find out about the law, instances where notice is not required and what happens if you change your mind
Faigh amach an dlí, cásanna nach bhfuil gá fógra a thabhairt agus cad a tharla má tá malairt intinn agat
Changing job: tax, PRSI and pension
Athrú poist: cáin, ÁSPC agus pinsean
There are various steps to be taken when changing job, particularly in relation to tax, social insurance (PRSI) and pension
Tá céimeanna éagsúla ann le glacadh le linn athrú poist maidir le cáin, ÁSPC agus pinsean
